Reviews.Title: Arrived on time and with Windows 7 to be like all the other office computers
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: It was well packaged and arrived on time.  It has Windows 7 to be like all the other office computers so we don't have to retrain the staff.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: LMJB
Reviews.Content: I searched for a computer with Windows 7. I heard about the problems they were having with Windows 8. This computer is fast and just what I needed.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Calvin Beringer
Reviews.Content: Everything so far works great. Other than a couple cosmetic things which didn't effect the performance, it's great. Haven't had any issues at all...

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-2520M 2.5GHz
8GB DDR3 SDRAM , 250GB 7200 rpm Hard Drive
14.0-inch widescreen LED-backlit display (1366 x 768 resolution)
SuperMulti DVD burner , Bluetooth, Built-in Webcam, FP Reader, 3G+WiFi
Windows 7 Professinal 64 bit
ProductInfo.Name: HP Elitebook 8460p Intel Core i5-2520M 2.5GHz, 250GB, 8GB DDR3, 14" (1366x768), DVD-RW, BlueTooth, Webcam, FP Reader, 3G + WiFi, Windows 7 Professional
